hero.title: Invest in the European answer to
hero.subtitle: With strong investors by our side, TRADEFOOX will become the next global success story – standing shoulder to shoulder with TikTok, Amazon, and Meta. Together, we will inspire the world and set new standards for digital super apps.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: Invest in the European answer to super apps.
vision.description: With strong investors by our side, TRADEFOOX will become the next global success story – standing shoulder to shoulder with TikTok, Amazon, and Meta. Together, we will inspire the world and set new standards for digital super apps.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: We build the technologies needed to connect people and drive growth.
mission.description: We're committed to creating platforms that bring people together and enable sustainable business growth across Europe.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Our innovations help people connect through chats, news feeds, and video feeds.
whatWeDo.description: We enable individuals and businesses to grow on a single platform, fostering meaningful connections and opportunities.

ourApproach.title: Our Approach
ourApproach.subtitle: We focus on technology, innovation, and meaningful connections.
ourApproach.description: By combining cutting-edge technology with human-centered design, we create solutions that truly matter to our users.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: TRADEFOOX is the next generation of apps – a true European Super App. It combines the best of online marketplaces, social networking, and content creation in one all-in-one platform. Modern, privacy-compliant, and user-centric. An app like TRADEFOOX has never existed before.

european.title: European Alternative
european.description: Building a European super app that respects privacy and data protection regulations while providing world-class functionality.

global.title: Global Scale
global.description: Designed for international expansion with multilingual support and localization for European, Latin American, and African markets.

userCentric.title: User-Centric
userCentric.description: Privacy-first approach with transparent data handling and user control over personal information.

features.title: What Makes TRADEFOOX Unique
features.subtitle: Six powerful core functions – united in a single app – create a platform that redefines digital life.
features.description: TRADEFOOX delivers everything others offer separately – seamlessly integrated, modern, and infinitely scalable.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Sale of new and used products, including groceries

listings.title: Listings
listings.description: Jobs, real estate, services, vehicles – like eBay classifieds

videoFeed.title: Video Feed
videoFeed.description: Short videos à la TikTok & YouTube Shorts – with creator monetization

ads.title: TRADEFOOX Ads
ads.description: Integrated advertising network for targeted reach

cta.title: All-in-One Platform
cta.description: From shopping to socializing, from content creation to communication – everything you need in one seamless experience.

globalScale.title: Ready for global scale
globalScale.subtitle: Built from the ground up for international expansion with comprehensive multilingual support and cross-platform availability.

languages.title: Platform in 19 languages
languages.description: German, English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Others with full i18n implementation

strategy.title: Internationalization strategy
strategy.description: Prepared for Europe, Latin America, and Africa with localized content and features

mobile.title: Native mobile apps
mobile.description: iOS & Android apps with full feature parity and optimized performance

web.title: Web platform
web.description: Full-featured web application accessible from any device with responsive design

traction.title: Traction & milestones
traction.subtitle: Our journey from concept to live platform with measurable progress and achievements

beta.title: Beta completed
beta.description: Marketplace in React Native, productive rollout starting in week 6

companyMilestones.subtitle: Key milestones in our company's journey

cta.title: Ready for Investment
cta.description: With proven traction and a scalable platform, we are accelerating growth – together with visionary investment partners. With TRADEFOOX, you will write the next global success story. This is more than an investment: you are shaping the next digital giant from Europe.

team.title: Founders & Team
team.subtitle: Meet the visionary leadership and interdisciplinary team building the future of digital platforms

founder.name: Ronny Streit
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.description: Visionary with a focus on tech, platform economics, and app architecture. Leading the development of a scalable platform with European DNA.

interdisciplinary.title: Interdisciplinary Team
interdisciplinary.description: With an interdisciplinary team of product design, software development, and sales, TRADEFOOX is building a scalable platform with European DNA.

dna.title: European DNA
dna.description: Our team combines deep technical expertise with a strong understanding of European market dynamics and regulatory requirements.

investment.title: Strategic Investors Welcome
investment.subtitle: We are opening our round to partners who want to join TRADEFOOX in shaping the future of Europe's digital platform economy and benefit from the growth of a platform that unites in one app everything others offer separately. This is the entry into a venture with the potential to become the next world-class success story.

platform.title: Platform already live & scalable
platform.description: Proven technology stack with demonstrated growth potential

monetization.title: Monetization models active
monetization.description: Ads, Marketplace, Premium features generating revenue

growth.title: Great growth opportunities
growth.description: Social commerce & creator economy expansion potential

access.title: Early-stage access
access.description: Exclusive investment opportunities in European super app

contact.title: Get Started
contact.description: Request our pitch deck or schedule an initial consultation to learn more about our investment opportunity.

market.title: Market Opportunity
market.description: The European super app market is underserved. TRADEFOOX is positioned to capture this opportunity with a privacy-first, European approach.

contact.title: Contact us now
contact.subtitle: Would you like to receive our pitch deck or have a non-binding discussion? Then write to us directly or visit our LinkedIn profile for updates & insights.

why.title: Why TRADEFOOX?
items: European alternative to Asian/US super apps

request.title: Request Information
request.description: Get our comprehensive pitch deck with detailed financials, market analysis, and growth projections.

footer.description: The European answer to super apps. Combining e-commerce, social media & communication in one privacy-first platform.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This platform uses cookies! In order to operate this website, it is necessary for us to use cookies. Some cookies are necessary to ensure functionality, others are needed for our statistics and others help us to show you only the advertisements that interest you. You can find out more in our privacy policy.

descriptions.googleAnalytics: For website statistics and performance analysis
descriptions.googleTagManager: For managing website tags and tracking
descriptions.hubSpot: For marketing automation and CRM functions
